properties.body:
EASTERN CARIBBEAN SEA.
SAINT LUCIA.
1. VESSEL, BLUE AND WHITE HULL, TWO PERSONS ON BOARD,
   DISABLED AND ADRIFT WITHIN SEVEN MILES WEST
   OF GROS PITON (13-48-25N 061-04-13W). VESSELS IN
   VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT,
   ASSIST IF POSSIBLE. REPORTS TO MRCC FORT DE FRANCE,
   PHONE: 59 659 670 9292, FAX: 59 59 663 2450.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 1472/12.
